weaponTalents.name: Boomerang
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Critical Hits have a 50% chance to return the bullet to the magazine, if a bullet is returned to the magazine the next shot has 50% increased Damage. Buff lasts for 10 seconds. Buff is lost on reload, weapon swap, or exiting combat.

weaponTalents.name: Breadbasket
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Body shots increase the next Headshot's Damage by 50% for 10 seconds, stacks up to 3 times. Buff is lost on miss, reload, weapon swap, or when the player exits combat.

weaponTalents.name: Close & Personal
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Kills within 7m increase weapon damage by 50% for the next 10 seconds. Kills refresh the buffs duration.

weaponTalents.name: Eyeless
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Deal 30% increased damage enemies affected by Blind.

weaponTalents.name: Fast Hands
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Each Critical Hit increases the Reload Speed for this weapon by 5%. Stacks up to 30 times. Buff is lost on weapon swap or when player is out of combat.

weaponTalents.name: Finisher
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Killing a target that is downed with this weapon increases the Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Damage of the next weapon you swap to within 10 seconds by 30% for 15 seconds.

weaponTalents.name: First Blood
weaponTalents.requirementsDescription: Requires a Scope with 8x magnification or higher
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: The first shot from a full magazine has 100% increased body damage. Reloading from an empty magazine resets this buff.

weaponTalents.name: Frenzy
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: For every 10 bullets in magazine capacity, gain +3% rate of fire and +3% weapon damage for 5s when reloading from empty.

weaponTalents.name: Ignited
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Deal 30% increased damage to enemies affected by Burning.

weaponTalents.name: Killer
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Killing an enemy with a critical hit grants 50% critical hit damage for 15s

weaponTalents.name: Lucky Shot
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Missed shots while in cover have a 100% chance to return the bullet to the magazine. Magazine capacity is increased by 20% of the base magazine size, this stacks with Extended Magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Measured
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: The top half of the magazine grants +20% rate of fire and -15% weapon damage,The bottom half of the magazine granges -20% rate of fire and +30% Weapon Damage.

weaponTalents.name: Naked
weaponTalents.requirementsDescription: Requires a Scope with 8x magnification or higher
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Headshot Damage is increased by 40% while you have no armor.

weaponTalents.name: Near Sighted
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Recieve 80% Stability at the cost of -35% optimal range

weaponTalents.name: On Empty
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: After fully reloading, this weapon has increased handling for 10 seconds. Buff persists through reload. The buff is lost when swapping weapons or exiting combat.

weaponTalents.name: Optimist
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Weapon damage is increased by 3% for every 10% ammo missing from the magazine

weaponTalents.name: Outsider
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: After killing an enemy, gain 100% optimal range and 100% accuracy for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Perpetuation
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Headshot kills grant +5% Skill Duration for 10s.

weaponTalents.name: Premeditated
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Weapon Damage is increased for every shell loaded up to a total of 25%, if all shells are reloaded then weapon damage is increased by an additional 10%. Buff lasts for 10 seconds. Damage increase is greater when the magazine capacity is lower. Swapping the weapon or reloading again resets the buff.

weaponTalents.name: Preservation
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Killing a Target repairs your armor by 10% of your maximum armor over 5 seconds. If the kill was from a headshot, the repair is 20% of your maximum armor over 5 seconds.

weaponTalents.name: Pummel
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: After 3 consecutive kills with body shots, your magazine is refilled and weapon damage is increased by 40% for 10 seconds. This can be extended up to 20 seconds. Buff is lost when swapping weapons.

weaponTalents.name: Ranger
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Weapon Damage is increased by 2% for every 5m you are from your target.

weaponTalents.name: Reformation
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Headshot kills increase Skill Repair and Healing by 150% for 25s

weaponTalents.name: Rifleman
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Headshots increase weapon damage by 10% for 5 seconds, this buff can stack 5 times. Once at max stacks each Headshot refreshes the duration of the buff. Non-Headshots remove this bonus.

weaponTalents.name: Sadist
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Deal 30% increased damage to Status Effected enemies.

weaponTalents.name: Salvage
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Killing a target has a 50% chance to refill the magazine.

weaponTalents.name: Spike
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Headshot kills grant +35% Skill Damage for 20s

weaponTalents.name: Steady Handed
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Landing shots increases weapon handling by 3%, stacks up to 10 times. Shots have a 5% to consume the stack and refills your magazine. 15s cd

weaponTalents.name: Strained
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Critical Hit Damage is increased by 5% for every 10% of your base maxmimum armor that is missing.

weaponTalents.name: Unhinged
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Receive 20% weapon damage at the cost of -25% weapon handling

weaponTalents.name: Unwavering
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Swapping to this weapon increases Weapon Stability by 300% for 5 seconds. Kills while this buff is active refreshes the duration of the buff. Swapping weapons disables this buff for 5 seconds.

weaponTalents.name: Vindictive
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Killing an enemy with a status affect applied grants all group members within 15m 20% critical strike chance and critical damage for 20s

weaponTalents.name: Accurate
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Accuracy increased by 15%

weaponTalents.name: Allegro
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Rate of Fire increased by 10%

weaponTalents.name: Distance
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Optimal Range increased by 15%

weaponTalents.name: Extra
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Magazine Capacity increased by 20%

weaponTalents.name: Jazz Hands
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Reload Speed increased by 10%

weaponTalents.name: Optimized
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Weapon Handling increased by 15%

weaponTalents.name: Stable
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Stability increased by 15%

weaponTalents.name: Cannon
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While this weapon is equipped the players throwing distance is increased by 10%

weaponTalents.name: Double Duty
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, reloading from empty gives you 20% of your magazine back as free ammo. Can occur once every 30s

weaponTalents.name: Everlasting
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, this weapon regenerates ammo while in cover.

weaponTalents.name: Greased
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, this weapon tucks away and increases weapon swap speed.

weaponTalents.name: In Rhythm
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While equipped, enemy kills have a 5% chance to refresh active skill cooldowns. This can only happen once every 60 seconds.

weaponTalents.name: Overlap
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, this weapons handling talent is applied to the currently active weapon. If the active weapon is an LMG, that weapon gets +5% reload speed. If the active weapon is an SMG, that weapon gets +5% accuracy. If the active weapon is an AR, that weapon gets +5% stability. If the active weapon is a Shotgun, that weapon gets +5% rate of fire. If the active weapon is a Rifle, that weapon gets +5% optimal range. If the active weapon is an MMR, that weapon gets +5% magazine size. If the active weapon is a Pistol, that weapon gets +5% handling.

weaponTalents.name: Protected Deploy
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While equipped, this weapon grants 10% bonus armor while deploying a skill

weaponTalents.name: Protected Reload
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Players receive 10% bonus armor while reloading

weaponTalents.name: ReCharged
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While at full armour skills have 25% increased duration and ammo

weaponTalents.name: Rooted
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While equipped and in cover, all skill damage and healing is increased by 25% for 10s. Buff is lost when exiting cover. Can occur once per 60s

weaponTalents.name: Stop, Drop, and Roll
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While equipped rolling removes on fire, bleed, and toxic status effects.Â  Can only happen once every 60 seconds.

weaponTalents.name: Transmission
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, shock status effects have a chance to transfer to nearby enemies.

weaponTalents.name: Waskly
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: While holstered, you are able to resist multiple ensnare attempts.

weaponTalents.name: Zen
weaponTalents.bonusDescription: Sitting in cover for 3 seconds removes any active blind or disorient status effects.
